products.name: Quaker caramel corn cakes
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain popcorn for a nutritious snack option.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring high quality ingredients.","Gluten-free, making it suitable for individuals with gluten sensitivities."]

products.name: Multi Grain Crispbread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Snacks,Cereals and potatoes,Salty snacks,Appetizers,Breads,Crackers,Crispbreads
products.facts: ["Made from a blend of whole grains including rye, oats, and wheat for added nutrition.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to minimize ecological impact."]

products.name: Natural Creamy Peanut Butter Spread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.labels: No gluten, No preservatives, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from 100% roasted peanuts with no added sugars or hydrogenated oils.","Contains essential nutrients such as protein, healthy fats, and vitamins.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to support local peanut farmers."]

products.name: Natural Creamy Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods,Legumes and their products,Spreads,Nuts and their products,Plant-based spreads,Sweet spreads,Oilseed purees,Legume butters,Nut butters,Peanut butters
products.labels: No cholesterol, No Trans Fat, High fat total, High potassium, High sodiumlevel, Low carbs, en:low-sodium, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from 100% roasted peanuts with no added sugars or preservatives.","Sourced from sustainable peanut farms that practice eco-friendly farming methods.","Contains healthy fats, protein, and essential nutrients, making it a nutritious choice.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact."]

products.name: Heritage Flakes Cereal
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, en:cereal-flakes
products.labels: Organic, Canada Organic, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats and other natural ingredients.","Packaging is recyclable to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial colors or flavors, ensuring high quality.","Produced with sustainable farming practices to support ecological balance."]

products.name: Carb Balance Flour Soft Taco Tortillas
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Flatbreads, White breads, Wheat breads, Wheat flatbreads
products.facts: ["Made with a blend of low-carb flour and fiber for healthier options.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, promoting clean eating.","The packaging is recyclable, reducing environmental impact.","Gluten-free options available, catering to diverse dietary needs."]

products.name: Sprite
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Sodas, Sweetened beverages
products.facts: ["Sprite is packaged in a recyclable aluminum can, which can be recycled indefinitely without loss of quality.","The production of Sprite cans uses less energy compared to glass bottles, contributing to lower carbon emissions.","Sprite is made with natural flavors and contains no caffeine, appealing to consumers looking for a refreshing beverage.","The brand has committed to using 50% recycled plastic in its PET bottles by 2030, promoting a circular economy."]

products.name: Takis Fuego - hot chili pepper & lime tortillas chips
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Appetizers, Chips and fries, Crisps, Corn chips
products.facts: ["Takis Fuego chips are made from corn masa, which is a primary ingredient in many tortilla products.","The packaging of Takis Fuego is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Takis Fuego contains no artificial flavors, ensuring a more natural taste experience.","The chips are cooked in vegetable oil, which is often sourced from sustainable suppliers."]

products.name: Kapris - Kapern, capers
products.facts: ["Kapris - Kapern are made from the unopened flower buds of the caper bush, scientifically known as Capparis spinosa.","The capers are typically preserved in brine or vinegar, which enhances their flavor and extends shelf life.","Capers are harvested sustainably, often by hand, to minimize environmental impact and ensure the health of caper bushes.","The product is known for its high quality, often being sourced from regions with ideal growing conditions, such as the Mediterranean."]

products.name: Grilled pepper bruschetta spread, peperoni grigliati
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality grilled peppers for a rich flavor.","Contains no artificial preservatives, promoting a healthier choice.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Suitable for vegetarians, making it a versatile spread for various diets."]
